item.title: Spawning gold
item.dc:creator: @Joachim2k1k Joachim2k1k
item.description:
@Joachim2k1k wrote:

u see:
ItemHandler.addItem(3658, 3497, 995, 100000000, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // 999M Gold

Replace it with this

ItemHandler.addItem(995, 3625, 3497, 999999999, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // 999M Gold

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning gold
item.dc:creator: @Derek123 Derek123
item.description:
@Derek123 wrote:

How would I make 999m be on the floor when a person goes to a mapâ€¦

This is my itemspawnpoint.java

[code]// Item Spawn Points by xerozcheez
import java.io.*;
public class itemspawnpoints
{
public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems()
{
for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++){
if(spawntimer <= 1)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(6739, 2702, 3460, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Dragon Axe
ItemHandler.addItem(6739, 2702, 3465, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Dragon Axe
ItemHandler.addItem(6739, 2700, 3465, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Dragon Axe
ItemHandler.addItem(6739, 2698, 3465, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Dragon Axe
ItemHandler.addItem(6739, 2698, 3460, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Dragon Axe
ItemHandler.addItem(6739, 2700, 3460, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Dragon Axe
ItemHandler.addItem(1275, 2653, 3377, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Rune Pickaxe
ItemHandler.addItem(1275, 2655, 3377, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Rune Pickaxe
ItemHandler.addItem(1275, 2654, 3377, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Rune Pickaxe
ItemHandler.addItem(1275, 2654, 3377, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Rune Pickaxe
spawntimer = 100;
ItemHandler.addItem(3658, 3497, 995, 100000000, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // 999M Gold
spawntimer = 1;
}
}
}

public void process()
{
LoadItems();
spawntimer -= 1;
}
}[/code]
